pages.text: -Male mammoths have larger tusks, while females have smaller tusks. $(br2)-Deinotherium have no gender dimorphism. $(br2)-Direwolves have no gender dimorphism. $(br2)-Cervalces Latifrons males will have antlers, while females have no antlers at all.

-Cervalces Latifrons males will have antlers, while females have no antlers at all. $(br2)-Paracertherium have no gender dimorphism. $(br2)-Dinofelis have no gender dimorphism. $(br2)-Titanis Walleri males have a crest, while females do not.
The $(l)Gender Test Strip$() is used to tell the genders of animals who may have no dimorphism, or are babies.
